about_the_game:
Fight to maintain your independence and maybe even your humanity, in a battle to see who will make it furthest in this world.

Battle Mages is a visual novel styled adult MMORPG with roguelite elements where players can play out fantasies together or go on fantasy adventures of their own. In the magical world of Battle Mages, becoming who you always wanted to be is easy, but staying that person becomes an ever-growing challenge as you venture deeper into a world that seeks to tempt you with an easy life of pleasure and shape your mind and body to its whims.

A World of Pleasure & Wonder

  • Live out your academy years attending magical classes and dueling in the hallways.
  • Explore the world and go on daring adventures on campus and beyond.
  • Use powerful spells, artifacts, and improvised weapons to take out the competition.

Character Creation With Deckbuilding

  • Start the game with unique characters after laying down their fortune in a deckbuilding minigame, which creates exciting new beginnings and fates for your characters.
  • Customize your appearance and accessorize your outfit with trinkets and magical properties, or do so to your foes, till their appearance and wardrobe fits your liking.
  • Complex player avatars visualize a myriad of customizable traits and characteristics.

Players who enjoy a little more risk can allow for bad endings, where they might lose their character to a blissful fate as someone's sex toy, favorite possession, or some other exciting fate. When taking risks, whether successfully or to their downfall, the game rewards the player with fortune cards to spend when creating their next character, which allows them to enter the game with unique backgrounds and traits that unlock special reactions and encounters. Ever wanted to play as an heir to a rich family? A princess? A member of a magical race? —Or maybe you got hit with some unseemly curses on your way to the academy?

Customize Your Erotic Experience

  • Pick from five personality natures that affect how the world reacts to your character.
  • Adjustable content filters allow you to control the sort of perverted fantasies you experience.
  • Dominate or be dominated in a never-ending struggle to maintain your independence and maybe even your humanity.

The game sports a variety of locations, outfits, toys, spells, themes, and other tools to help facilitate roleplay and allow players to create the narrative and fantasy they desire. The academy exists in a world not unlike our own, just out of sight, and where virtually anything is possible by either harnessing or bending the natural laws surrounding us. The academy has something to offer for most, whether they prefer a more magic or science-heavy fantasy.

content_descriptors.notes:
Players may experience explicit visual, audio, and textual depictions of nudity, sexual situations involving various orientations, transformation themes of a perverted nature, post-combat victory sex, and other erotic and perverted fantasies.

The game features adjustable content filters that assist players in shielding themselves from unfavoured fantasies and sexual situations, but is no assurance they won't be exposed to these materials.
